channel.title: How to remove this thing?(Picture inside!)
channel.description:
Hi,You see the quest "In Aid of the Myreque"?,How can I remove it,I tried from texthandler.java but I couldn't find it... here is picture :
[img]http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/8566/loolw.png[/img]

item.title: How to remove this thing?(Picture inside!)
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_k4t3 0wn3r k4t3
item.description:
@0wn3r_k4t3 wrote:

It wont be in neither. Its on runescape Cache, you have to overright it with something blank. On 508 its different, idk really much about 317 atm.

Read full topic

item.source: How to remove this thing?(Picture inside!)

item.title: How to remove this thing?(Picture inside!)
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Nullz:

use your z-file searcher and type the quest name, they will tell you where to find it, then remove it from that file.

Are you talking about removing it client-sided?

Don’t remove it client-sided, simply remove it server-sided. By default, it’s set to that as it’s stated above. You have to figure out the id for that line and call the sendQuest for it. If you want it blank, simply make it sendQuest("", id);

Read full topic
item.source: How to remove this thing?(Picture inside!)

item.title: How to remove this thing?(Picture inside!)
item.dc:creator: @_Mark ``Mark
item.description:
@_Mark wrote:

lord killord:

You’ll need something to overright it … that’s the only way to remove it, because it’s a part of the cache, which you can’t modify

Are you sure?
Not sure, is it a 508 or 525? (Looking at the interface, but then again, could be 317 with looking on the map…)
If so, check ActionButton, or ActionSender.java.

Read full topic
